   20: 
   21: -module(ct_fail_init_tc_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -suite_defaults([{timetrap, {minutes, 10}}]).
   24: 
   25: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   26: -compile(export_all).
   27: 
   28: -include("ct.hrl").
   29: 
   30: %% Test server callback functions
   31: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   32:     Config.
   33: 
   34: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   35:     ok.
   36: 
   37: init_per_testcase(TestCase, _Config) ->
   38:     ct:fail("Failed in init_per_testcase").
   39: 
   40: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   41:     ok.
   42: 
   43: all() ->
   44:     [test_case].
   45: 
   46: %% Test cases starts here.
   47: test_case(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   48:     ok.
   49:
